name: Kieslect KR Smart Calling Smart Watch
description:
Ultra-vivid 1.32 inch Semi-AMOLED display
Bluetooth Calling Support
70 Sport Modes
AI Voice Assistant

specifications.Display: 1.32’’ Semi-AMOLED Full-screen touch Retina Display with 360x360 pixel resolution
specifications.Battery:
Battery Capacity: 280mAh
Charging Method: Magnetic Charging
Theoretical Charging Duration: Approx.2 Hours
Typical Usage Scenario Battery Life: Up to 3 Days
Heavy Usage Scenario Battery Life: Up to 2 Days
Battery Saver Mode Battery Life: 9.2 Days
specifications.OS: Android or IOS
specifications.SpecialFeatures:
The Main Function:
Bluetooth Phone Calls, Music Player, Smart Voice Assistant, Password Protection, Built-in Games.

Health Function:
Breathing Training, Stress Test, Emotional test, Sleep monitor, SpO₂ Monitor, Heart Rate Monitor, Step Counting, Calory Counting.

70 Workout Modes:
Walking, Running, Indoor Running, Cycling, Mountaineering, Spinning, Yoga, Rope Skipping, Gymnastics, Jumping, Badminton, Table Tennis, Football, Basketball, Tennis, Hockey, Rugby, Rowing, Crunches, free training, etc.

Reminder Function:
Call reminder, Call&SMS Reminder, App Reminder, Alarm Reminder, MenstrualPeriod Reminder, Sedentary Reminder.

Others:
Custom Dial, Calculator, Stopwatch, Timer, Weather Forecast, Flashlight, Find Phone, Clock, Shake Hand Take Photo.
specifications.Sensor: VC32S biometric sensor (Support blood-oxygen, Heart rate sensor)
specifications.Others: IP68 waterproof
